topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54cdce1b63687231aae30000#post_54cdce1b63687231aae30000
[bq="Carcass Strife"]So, lemme get something straight.
SJW = Feelings over Facts?[/bq]
They believe word for word "facts are just another form of oppression against women".

Getting kind of rude here but there's several major groups in the sjw community:
1)Those in it for sex favors; aka "you should stop objectifying women. . . so hey classy woman how about we go grab some coffee later?"
Example of this: moot. . . not even shitting you.
2)Young teenagers that are in their years in which they are still emotionally developing into adults and haven't learned yet to beware people that go "help!  I need $50 from your parent's bank accounts"
A lot of Anita Sarkeesian's kickstarter supporters have become anti-sjw because they've been physically growing up; back then the majority of them were people in their mid-teens and now they're either out of high school or about to get out of high school.
Examples: a fair chunk of anti-sjw were originally sjw.
3)The people in it for money.
Example: Wu is a millionaire and constantly begs for money online.
4)People just straight up in the dark about the true nature of the movement.  The reason why I don't ever act like a shitbag to sjw is because the vast majority of them do believe in equality, but they don't know what the organization they're a part of actually does.  Think about it as like members of PETA; the vast majority of their members don't know that PETA kills thousands of animals a year.
